about_the_game:
Usurpator

– The ultimate extraction melee slasher. Arm yourself, master brutal combat, and face the hordes of Evil in a land teeming with danger. Forge alliances or clash with other players as you craft powerful weapons, unlock talents, and carve your path to glory. Will you rise or fall in the fight against darkness?

◆ Features ◆

Extraction

Venture into the perilous unknown to cleanse the land of evil. Enter vast open areas through a portal in your camp, complete quests, gather resources, and uncover loot and crafting recipes. Battle NPCs and other players, then fight your way back to safety and return home with your rewards.

Progression

Level up your hero by defeating enemies and completing challenging quests. Customize your playstyle with unique talents and crafted magic runes for your gear and weapons. Equip powerful magical jewelry to boost your strength and dazzling cosmetics to express your individuality and stand out among your allies!

Arena

Step into the Arena, where only the bravest Knights earn their path to immortality! Fight solo or team up with friends to climb the leaderboard and prove your dominance.

Crafting

In the land of Evil, harvest resources from the world around you to craft powerful weapon runes, potent spells, and healing potions. Expand your arsenal with a diverse array of weapons, from throwable spears to devastating magic fireballs.

Combat

Fast-paced and easy to learn, combat in Usurpator demands precision. Chain combos, block, parry, or dodge to outwit foes. Break defenses or send enemies flying off cliffs. Master the blade, and even the boldest opponents will tremble before you!

Backstory

The war has ravaged our realm, leaving battlefields littered with the shattered armor of ten thousand fallen heroes. Even as the conflict rumbles on the horizon like distant thunder, a greater terror now festers in the cursed land of Evil.

Whispers of strange, glowing mists and peculiar horrors surround the twisted spires of Erator Cathedral. It is said the usurper Baron Siegwar, once a reclusive eccentric obsessed with forbidden mystical arts, is raising an army. For years, he shut himself away in shadowy galleries, indulging his morbid fascination with arcane curiosities brought by adventurers and charlatans from faraway lands.

Now, rumors spread of his courtiers turning murderous, descending upon nearby villages with unholy bloodlust. Survivors speak of inhuman strength and swirling voids where eyes should be. Worse, those struck down rise again, swords in hand, to join the slaughter.

Once imprisoned for defying the King, you have escaped your chains to find a world in ruin. Now, armed with nothing but your blade, you must fight to reclaim the land that once betrayed you—before it is consumed by darkness.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
